Macros

#define BSP_CFG_CAPT_QUEUE_LEN_PER_CH   (16U)
 Number of queue length per capture channel in capture driver.
 
#define BSP_CFG_DISP_QUEUE_LEN_PER_INST   (16U)
 Number of queue length per display instance in display driver.

 Number of queue length per M2M channel in M2M driver.

 Number of queue length per VPE channel in VPE driver.

 Number of queue length per handle in DSS M2M driver.

#define VPS_CFG_CAPT_NUM_INST_OBJS
 Number of capture objects to allocate. More...
 

Detailed Description

BSP header file containing configuration details, for the size of static object array.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define VPS_CFG_CAPT_NUM_INST_OBJS
Value:
(CSL_VPS_VIP_PORT_PER_CNT + \
CSL_VPS_DSS_WB_PIPE_PER_CNT + \
CSL_VPS_ISS_CAPT_PIPE_PER_CNT)

Number of capture objects to allocate.

Note: This macro is used for storing platform data at init time. Hence this should be changed only when a particular capture instance is removed from the build using make macros like VPS_VIP1_BUILD, VPS_ISS_BUILD etc...
